feedbackText: The app keeps crashing, and it takes forever to load any pages. Very disappointing.
My product arrived late and in poor condition. The packaging was damaged and the product was defective.
I waited too long for a response from customer service. It took several days, and my issue is still unresolved.
The app’s interface is confusing, and I’m unable to find any of the features I need. Very frustrating.
I ordered my product over a week ago, and it still hasn’t arrived. I’m starting to lose faith in the service.
The app crashes every time I try to make a purchase. This is really frustrating. Please fix it soon.
Product quality is bad. Mine came with scratches and dents. I’m not happy with this purchase at all.
Customer service was unhelpful. They didn’t give me any useful information to resolve my issue. Very disappointing.
I had to wait for two weeks for delivery, and when it arrived, the product was completely wrong. This has been a nightmare.
App still has many bugs. It’s affecting my experience, and I’m considering uninstalling it.
